_header: Mary the mild of whom I mean / Is Gods mother…
Note: For other MSS which place the rubric at the beginning of the story itself see 5161; for another version, see 6660.
Subjects: Virgin Mary, miracles of; miracles; exempla
_description: The Abbess who went with Child: Narratio in the Northern Homily Cycle — preceded by eighteen introductory lines

BodAsh42.First Lines:
Marie þe mylde of whaim i meneEs goddes modir & maiden
                    clene…
BodAsh42.Last Lines:
…In to þat contre þare scho es qweneþidir scho
                    bringe vs all bedene . Amen
BodAsh42.Editions:
Thompson,  Anne B.,
                        ed.  
             The Northern Homily
                    Cycle.
         Kalamazoo, MI: Western Michigan University for TEAMS, 2008.

BLHar2391.First Lines: Mary þe mylde of wham I meneEs godȝ moder & maydys clene…
BLHar2391.Last Lines: …In to þat countre þar scho es qweneȝeder scho bryng vs all be dene
